      • match

        public SpotMatchList match(DexterLocalParams localParams,
                           it.cnr.isti.hpc.dexter.common.Document document)
        Description copied from interface: Spotter
        Given a document a Spotter identifies all the fragments that could be referring to an entity. It returns a list of Spots, i.e. mentions ( SpotMatchList) each one associated with a set of candidate entities C, that could be represented by the spot.
        Specified by:
        match in interface Spotter
        Parameters:
        localParams - contains particular parameters set for this query, can be null.
        Returns:
        a list of spots, each one associated with a set of candidate entities C, that could be represented by the spot.
